template.name: Wait and Ingest a set of grouped files

labels.label: Restart GenerateFlowFile to create a set of files under the input directory.
Important to set 'Releasable FlowFile Count' as 0 to not delete signal
Wait and Ingest a set of grouped files
At this point, it's confirmed that the all files for a group exist. Fetch and process each file.
Use ex2 files to proceed flow.
ab.ex1 is scheduled to run per 2 sec. To make every ex2 enters 'wait' relationship at least once.
Stop some of these 4 processors to simulate delay of arrival.
